Game.Overview:
Update 1.2 - INFECTION! New level, new mode, new weapons and new enemies!
Feeling angry?
RED is the ultimate dual stick shooter - visceral, vibrant and filled to the brim with unlockables!
Take the role of Rick Steele as he battles an invasion of mutants in the city. Using a variety of powerups, abilities and weapons, he will need to fend off hordes of disgusting and furious creatures dead set on consuming everything and everyone in their sight.
Featuring:
- Smexy cartoon graphics - Same couch multiplayer *NEW* - Unique player abilities - Special bonuses like the powerful Bio-Shield - Competitive leaderboards - Infection infinite survival mode
PLUS! - Buy the full version for even more future content!
